scripts.unit: rm -rf output && abap_transpile && echo RUNNING && node --expose-gc output/index.mjs && echo OK
scripts.postgres:init: cat test/adbc/init.sql | docker exec -i postgresql psql -U postgres -d postgres
scripts.docker:start: docker compose -p open-abap -f test/stack.yml up -d --wait && npm run postgres:init
scripts.test: npm run lint && npm run unit
